topic.title: 1 (or 2 or 4) File Updates failed
topic.body: I've been looking at a fair number of sites and find many of them have this message while loading. Now why would that be. Another one: I went to one site and it said "connecting", then said it had found 50 peers, then finally failed saying it couldn't download index.html. Bugs I assume, or is it me?

1_1Lr88ePoU9FsXzkUPsENX5xLcei8jtxeTM.body: Yeah, I was wondering if it was maybe offline people that had few peers. But the experience we've had with 50 peers found and then index.html can't be downloaded??? That seems somewhat like a bug...
